java.io
Class FilterWriter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.io.Writer
        |
        +--java.io.FilterWriter
Direct Known Subclasses:
TextWriter
public abstract class FilterWriter
extends Writer

Untamed: Abstract class for writing filtered character streams. The abstract class FilterWriter itself provides default methods that pass all requests to the contained stream. Subclasses of FilterWriter should override some of these methods and may also provide additional methods and fields.

Since:
JDK1.1
Version:
1.13, 01/12/03
Author:
Mark Reinhold
